name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-expert-finder-js
title: Expert Finder with SSO in Copilot using multi parameter search
shortDescription: Microsoft Teams message extension that can be used as a plugin to Search for candidates and share profiles matching a criteria.
longDescription: This sample implements a Teams message extension that can be used as a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365. The message extension allows users to query the candidates based on their skills, location and availability.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing microsoft teams nodejs msgext-expert-finder-js sample
